mapper.select: SELECT /* BoardMapper.selectBoardListCnt 게시판 목록 갯수 조회 */ COUNT(A.SEQ) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM MAIN_BOARD A WHERE A.ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ IS NULL AND A.SEQ = #{seq} AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') AND A.CATEGORY = #{category}

SELECT /* BoardMapper.selectBoardList 게시판 목록 조회 */ A.SEQ , A.CATEGORY , B.CODE_NAME , A.TITLE , A.BODY_TEXT , A.ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ , C.COMMENT_CNT , A.ORDER_NUM , A.CNG_USER_NO , CONCAT(D.FILE_NAME, '.', D.FILE_EXTENSION) AS FILE_INFO , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DT2 , DATE_FORMAT(A.CNG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') CNG_DT FROM MAIN_BOARD A INNER JOIN CODE B ON (A.CATEGORY = B.CODE AND B.CODE_TYPE = 'BOARD') LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ) AS COMMENT_CNT , ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ FROM main_board WHERE ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ) AS C ON A.SEQ = C.ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ LEFT JOIN BOARD_ADD_FILE D ON A.SEQ = D.SEQ WHERE A.ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ IS NULL AND A.SEQ = #{seq} AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') AND A.CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY SEQ ASC LIMIT #{pageListCnt} OFFSET #{startIdx}

SELECT /* BoardMapper.selectBoardOne 게시판 상세 조회 */ A.SEQ , A.CATEGORY , B.CODE_NAME , A.TITLE , A.BODY_TEXT , A.ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ , A.ORDER_NUM , A.CNG_USER_NO , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DT , A.CNG_DT , CONCAT(C.FILE_NAME, '.', C.FILE_EXTENSION) AS FILE_NAME , C.FILE_SIZE , C.FILE_SEQ FROM MAIN_BOARD A INNER JOIN CODE B ON A.CATEGORY = B.CODE LEFT JOIN BOARD_ADD_FILE C ON A.SEQ = C.SEQ WHERE A.SEQ = #{seq} AND B.CODE_TYPE = 'BOARD'
SELECT /* BoardMapper.selectBoardOneCommemtList 게시판 상세 댓글 조회 */ SEQ , CATEGORY , TITLE , BODY_TEXT FROM MAIN_BOARD WHERE ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE MAIN_BOARD /* BoardMapper.updateBoardOne 게시판 update */ SET CATEGORY = #{category}, TITLE = #{title}, BODY_TEXT = #{bodyText}, CNG_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MAIN_BOARD /* BoardMapper.deleteBoardOne 게시판 delete */ WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
DELETE FROM BOARD_ADD_FILE /* BoardMapper.deleteBoardFile 게시판 첨부파일 delete */ WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
